        texture - Pokemon texture
        nome - Pokemon name
        element - Pokemon element
        HP - Pokemon hitpoints stat
        att - Pokemon attack stat
        def - Pokemon defense stat
        SPA - pokemon special attack stat
        SPD - pokemon special defense stat
        ag - pokemon agility stat
